name: PHPickerConfigurationAssetRepresentationMode
desc: Constants identifying the mode the system uses when many representations exist for an asset.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: A mode that indicates that the system chooses the appropriate asset representation.

items.name: case compatible
items.desc: A mode that uses the most compatible asset representation.

items.name: case current
items.desc: A mode that uses the current representation to avoid transcoding, if possible.
